labels.name: story
labels.value: Verify Scroll Up without 'Arrow' button and Scroll Down functionality

name: Test Case 26: Verify Scroll Up without 'Arrow' button and Scroll Down functionality

description:
1. Launch browser
2. Navigate to url 'http://automationexercise.com'
3. Verify that home page is visible successfully
4. Scroll down page to bottom
5. Verify 'SUBSCRIPTION' is visible
6. Scroll up page to top
7. Verify that page is scrolled up and 'Full-Fledged practice website for Automation Engineers' text is visible on screen

steps.name: Verify that home page is visible successfully
Verify that page is scrolled up and 'Full-Fledged practice website for Automation Engineers' text is visible on screen
